title: Whom should the victim of Domestic Violence approach?
content:
In case of domestic the following in your District you may approach:

a) Protection officer ( notified by State Government)

b) Service Provider ( notified by State Government )

c) Police officer

d) Magistrate

e) Any well – wisher or local NGOs who would approach any of the officer mentioned at (a), (b), (c) and above.
